name: Tiny Quest (Pastelpix)
description:
Tiny Quest is an idle RPG made for the 4MB Jam.

You need to help Hero by crafting items for him so he can become stronger and defeat the evil mage.

The game is still in development, many more items will be added!

  • Controls: Double-click to use/equip items. Drag and Drop items onto the crafting slots to merge them.

If you like this game, then please consider making a donation, it will help me add more features and create more games that you will - hopefully - like as well. :)

Thank you!

Developed by Pastelpix

Graphics by GrafxKid - https://grafxkid.itch.io/

Music by DarkBasic
